data.what_is: A marketing automation platform and service for you to optimize your email marketing campaigns and engage your customers more effectively.
data.product_description: elfoMAP provides a marketing automation platform and services for you to optimize your email marketing campaigns and engage your customers more effectively.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Perfect for start-ups or small companies.
For own brand business and want extra customization.
For growing businesses looking to stand out from the crowd.
For total control that scales with your business, whether it's big or small.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about elfoMAP?
I love the simple layout of this app and how easy it is to navigate.

What do you dislike about elfoMAP?
Sometimes the pages lag a bit or I lose my information when I get disconnected from wifi. I wish there were a safety feature to prevent this from happening. That would be great.

What problems is elfoMAP solving and how is that benefiting you?
I save so much time during my workday with this app. I can now spend more time on things that demand my attention and help me be more productive.
